page.title: Apple AirPort Extreme Base Station A1408 (MD031LL/A)

revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Apple |model=A1408 |revision=(MD031LL/A) |upc=885909480845 |asin=B00FTOXP3Q,B0057AVXJA |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U01H734 |manuf_rev=T01 |availability=common |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/21/2011 |fcc_id=BCGA1408 |ic_id=579C-A1408 |pcb_id=U01H734T01 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281;88F6281-A1, C120, 88F6-BIA2; |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS1G83EFR-S5C |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Broadcom BCM94331PCIEDUAL |wi1_module_if=PCIe (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=Broadcom BCM94331PCIEDUAL |wi2_module_if=PCIe (non-standard connector) |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6350R;88E6350R-TFJ2; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=PCIe Packet Switch;Pericom Semiconductor;PI7C9X20303UL;;1; ,,, Low Current 1MHz Synchronous Buck Regulator;Intersil;ISL8014;;4; ,,, CPLD Chip (25MHz);Silego Technology;SLG2AP105V;;1; |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=B8:8D:12,B8:C7:5D,70:56:81 |oui_eth=B8:8D:12,B8:C7:5D,70:56:81 }}
"APPLE", "820-2622-A", and "(C) 2009" is silkscreened on the mainboard in the FCC photos. :The ''[[Broadcom]]'' logo, "BCM94331PCIEDUAL", and "200-120101-0050 A" :is silkscreened on the wireless module in the FCC photos.
Manufactured by [[Foxconn]] / Hon Hai / [[Ambit]] Microsystems (internal P/N U01H734T01) :MD031AM/A seems to be the model of this device in Canada.
The FCC submitted manual says the default SSID is '''AirPort Network XXXXXX''', :where '''XXXXXX''' is the last three octets of the MAC address.
===Reviews=== *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/4577/airport-extreme-5th-gen-and-time-capsule-4th-gen-review-faster-wifi-teardown ''Teardown'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31564-apple-airport-extreme-gen-5-reviewed ''Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
